thread.title: Cute, quaint, loveky
thread.title_full: Cute, quaint, loveky - Review of Le Relais Montmartre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Wallacg
title: Cute, quaint, loveky
text:
Actually stayed here a few years ago but would definitely go back.
It's a small quaint hotel but lovely. Rooms are very clean, hotel is cute, bathrooms spotless and very clean (I'm fusing about that).
Located walking distance from restaurants and much more. And the staff is very friendly.
